name: thiep-cuoi
description: Thiệp cưới online - Vũ Hải Hà & Phạm Văn Cường

scripts.deploy: npm run update-version && git add . && git commit -m "Update version and deploy" && git push origin main
scripts.deploy-optimized: npm run optimize-images && npm run update-version && git add . && git commit -m "Optimize images and deploy" && git push origin main
scripts.deploy-fast: npm run create-thumbnails && npm run compress-images && npm run update-version && git add . && git commit -m "Fast loading optimization" && git push origin main

author: buidiep68
